oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Guthrie, Bradley and Jones Appliances
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Guthrie, Bradley and Jones Store. There are tractors in front of the store.

Oliver King Jones (1879-1956), manufacturer and hardware merchant, was born in Sweetwater. After attending the Sweetwater Military College (later Tennessee Military Institute), Mr. Jones began his career. In 1902 he was a founder of Guthrie , Bradley & Jones in Sweetwater , a retail hardware , furniture , and appliance business , and he served as president of this concern from its founding until his death .
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tractors; General stores; Stores & shops; Real estate business
